comments.body: As per https://github.com/dperini/nwmatcher#installation this can be used globally and is available as `NW.Dom`. That needs to be reflected in the definition. Please refer https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped#how-do-i-write-definitions-for-packages-that-can-be-used-globally-and-as-a-module for more information.
